Pre-Game Insights: India got off to a winning start in the ICC ODI World Cup 2023
Team India beat Australia by 6 wickets
India will next face Afghanistan in the round-robin format of World Cup 2023
Shubman Gill will not be travelling with the team to Delhi on 9th October 2023
Shubman Gill missed the team’s first fixture in the ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 against Australia in Chennai
Shubman Gill is set to miss the team’s next fixture against Afghanistan in Delhi on the 11th of October
Shubman Gill will stay back in Chennai and will be under the supervision of the medical team
